briefdescription.para: Tries to interpret the address entry in a platform-specific way, creating a platform-specific server type if appropriate.

detaileddescription.para: Sets error if the result is not OK.

parameterdescription.para: location to store a new DBusServer, or NULL on failure.
location to store rationale for failure on bad address

briefdescription.para: Creates a new server listening on the given Unix domain socket.

parameterdescription.para: the path for the domain socket.
TRUE to use abstract socket namespace
location to store reason for failure.

simplesect.para: the new server, or NULL on failure.
